A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a huge disaster. It was by far one of the most poorly written comedy movies of this year\, I can say that at least. It's weird to say this because I had no idea that star wars was ever intended to be a comedy.\nBut really\, Disney copied the Empire Strikes Back's plot\, mixed in with a bunch of time wasting garbage...huge lack of character development\, complete misuse of the concept of the force\, REY DOESN'T GET TRAINED. Kylo Ren gets his butt handed to him by a stormtrooper guard\, there's no lightsaber duel the whole movie\, and they add in a pointless romance triangle. Huge disappointment.
